en: I love Jehovah, because he heareth My voice and my supplications.
hmr: LALPA chu ka hmangai a nih, ka râwl le Lunginsiet ka hninahai chu a ngai leiin.

en: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, Therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
hmr: Keia tieng a na a hung sit leiin, Ka dam sûng po po chun ama chu ko ka tih.

en: The cords of death compassed me, And the pains of Sheol gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
hmr: Thina hruihruolhai chun an mi zem a, Seol natnahai chun a mi man a, Lunginzîngna le lungngaina ka tuok a.

en: Then called I upon the name of Jehovah: O Jehovah, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
hmr: Chu phingle chun LALPA hming chu ka ko a, “Aw LALPA, lunginsiettakin ka hringna hi sanhim rawh,” tiin.

en: Gracious is Jehovah, and righteous; Yea, our God is merciful.
hmr: LALPA chu mi lunginsietthei le feltak a na, Anih, ei Pathien chu mi lainattheitak a nih.

en: Jehovah preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he saved me.
hmr: LALPA chun mimâwlhai chu a humhim hlak a, Sukhnuoiin ka um a, ama chun a mi sandam tah a,

en: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; For Jehovah hath dealt bountifully with thee.
hmr: Aw ka hringna, i châwlnaa chun kîr nâwk rawh, LALPA chun i chungah ṭhatakin a thaw ta sih a.

en: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, Mine eyes from tears, And my feet from falling.
hmr: Ka hringna hi thinaa inthawkin, Ka mithai hi mitthlia inthawkin, Ka kehai hi tlûknaa inthawk chun i sanhim sih a.

en: I will walk before Jehovah In the land of the living.
hmr: Mi hring rama hin, LALPA hmaah lêng ka tih.

en: I believe, for I will speak: I was greatly afflicted:
hmr: Ka ring a, thu ka hril ding a ni hi, Nasataka sukrinumin ka um kha.

en: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
hmr: Ka hamhaiin, “Mi po po khêl an nih,” ka lo ti tah a.

en: What shall I render unto Jehovah For all his benefits toward me?
hmr: Ka chunga a thil thaw ṭhat po po hi, LALPA kuomah ieng am pe ve thung ka ta aw?

en: I will take the cup of salvation, And call upon the name of Jehovah.
hmr: Sandamna no lâng ka ta, LALPA hming chu ko ka tih.

en: I will pay my vows unto Jehovah, Yea, in the presence of all his people.
hmr: Ka thutiemhai chu LALPA kuomah hlen ka ta, Anih, a mihai po po hmaa chun.

en: Precious in the sight of Jehovah Is the death of his saints.
hmr: A mi inthienghai thina chu, LALPA ngai chun hlutak a nih.

en: O Jehovah, truly I am thy servant: I am thy servant, the son of thy handmaid; Thou hast loosed my bonds.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i siehlaw ka ni tak zet el, I siehlaw i suoknu naupa chu ka na, Khuopa ka umnahai chu i mi sût tah a.

en: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, And will call upon the name of Jehovah.
hmr: Lâwmthuhril inthawinahai chu inhlân ka ti cheh a, LALPA hming chu ko ka tih.

en: I will pay my vows unto Jehovah, Yea, in the presence of all his people,
hmr: Ka thutiemhai chu LALPA kuomah hlen ka ta; Anih, a mihai po po hmaa chun,

en: In the courts of Jehovah’s house, In the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA biekin inhuonna sûng tuollaiah, Aw Jerusalem, i laitaka chun. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
